text: Muhammad Nurul Islam (born ) is a Bangladeshi diplomat from Chittagong, who was born on June 1943. He currently serves as a Honorary Consul General of Japan in Chittagong, Bangladesh. ==Personal life== Islam was born in 1943 in Chittagong. He was graduated from Chittagong College under the University of Dhaka in 1963. He completes a degree on the Japanese language from the University of Tokyo under the Japan Foundationâ€™s scholarship scheme in 1968. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Living people Category:1943 births Category:People from Chittagong Division Category:Asian diplomats
title: Muhammad Nurul Islam
